id.description: the unique value that identifies this element

version.description: the unique value that identifies this particular version of this element

createdAt.description: the ISO 8601-formatted timestamp of when the first version of the element was created

modifiedAt.description: the ISO 8601-formatted timestamp of when this version of the element was created

userId.description: the ID of the user who made this edit

type.description: a string descriptor that describes the data in 'value'

links.description: the version strings of the previous document versions this one is replacing

schemaVersion.description: the version of the schema that the content in 'value' follows. defaults to 1 if not specified

value.description: the unique value that identifies the element
